name: HIVInfectionTestsForHIVNucleicAcidQualitative
title: HIV Infection (Tests for HIV Nucleic Acid [Qualitative])
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of HIV.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: HIV probe;  LOINC search: "HIV -(viral load) (probe or sequencing) -panel -donor"),(Exclusion Criteria: viral load, panel tests, and donor tests)
